name: Elysia Moonlight
backStory: Elysia Moonlight, an Elven Sorceress, grew up amidst the ancient crystals of the Glimmering Reaches. From a young age, she displayed a natural affinity for magic, harnessing the power of light to protect her homeland. As the Guardian of the Crystalline Sanctum, Elysia dedicated her life to preserving the delicate balance of the realm. When Shadowweaver's darkness threatened to consume everything she held dear, Elysia embarked on a perilous journey to confront the malevolent entity and bring back the light to the Glimmering Reaches.
